name: driver-management-system
description: Premium driver warnings and holiday booking management system

scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:server
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.clean: rimraf client/dist server/dist client/node_modules server/node_modules node_modules
scripts.update:deps: npm update && cd client && npm update && cd ../server && npm update
